sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 捣麻糬大会是山口组每年的惯例。

sentences.english: It's so spicy. My lips went numb.
sentences.chinese: 这东西又麻又辣，我的嘴唇都麻了。

sentences.english: A group of about 30 women are sitting on a large jute mat.
sentences.chinese: 大约三十个已婚妇女坐在一块巨大的麻草垫上。

sentences.english: All information and data contained in this Website is complied only for the members of Yaumatei Wendell Church for reference.

sentences.chinese: 泰国麻纺织和麻装饰用品制造商。

sentences.english: After some time, my fingers grew cold and numb, so I took the bandage off and threw it away.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，手指又冷又麻，我便扯下绷带扔掉了。

sentences.english: A teak deck for al fresco dining and a canopy for shade.

sentences.english: When the oil ran out, the flax smoked and they quenched it.
sentences.chinese: 油用尽了，麻冒烟，他们就吹灭。

sentences.english: A great variety of plants are called hemps in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国中文名称中称作“麻”的植物极为繁多。

sentences.english: Mr Kwong, Samson killed six, hemp firmly missing.

sentences.chinese: 以利沙，难道没有犹太麻疯病人吗？

sentences.english: East Indian tree with oily seeds yield chaulmoogra oil used to treat leprosy.
sentences.chinese: 子树中获取的一种油，用于治疗皮肤疾病和麻疯病。
